artist: Painter: After Camillo Procaccini; Draftsman: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Giuseppe Rosaspina
description: Christ Child in manger at center; Mary kneeling before manger in a stable; cow behind manger; three angels above; shepherds and large crowd of people surround manger
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscriptions

on sheet in black: Camille Procaccini dip.   F. Rosaspina dis.  G Rosaspina inc. / LA NATIVITA DI N. S. GESU CRISTO | on sheet in  pencil: 2-243
title: The Birth of Jesus Christ
